docs.text: Welcome to Sosotech Docs This is the front page of Sosotech Docs. Terraform module structure ready modules s3, ec2 Im using the development environment in this path --> /sosoweekly/week02/client/module-client/development to call my main module folders found in /sosoweekly/week02/modules ready modules s3, ec2 Im using the development environment in this path --> /sosoweekly/week02/client/module-client/development to call my main module folders found in /sosoweekly/week02/modules week02 ├── modules │ │ └── ec2 │ │ ├── main.tf │ ├── output.tf │ └── variables.tf ├── client └── module-client └── staging └── production └── test └── development └── ec2-module-code ├── main.tf ├── output.tf └── variables.tf └── ... => Call the module (EX: ec2) using this PATH: source = "../../../../modules/ec2"
